2CBBFC1D67D245B6B97A1FA08B714B12.description: Describe and differentiate between voice input for command and control systems to operate a computer system, vocabulary dictation systems for general input and voice print recognition for security. Discuss the suitability of each system in different situations.

1E90260B9C874BDA8B2869A4BF1C9E2A.description: Compare and explain the efficiency of data compression algorithms in terms of compression ratio, compression time, decompression time and saving percentage.

C60315C32D284F86B4280C8DF7C8E5CC.description: Explain and apply a shortest-path algorithm.

4E6D1BA81C7A4C69B0E21F4B8DE00783.description: Explain the need for a variety of sorting algorithms both recursive and non-recursive.

C99969F2A4104707BEC93C483D8233DB.description: Identify, explain and apply appropriate techniques of validation and verification in algorithms and programs.

FAC66D7D17FF49BD803DD20225336D93.description: Explain the use of recursion in algorithms and programs and consider the potential elegance of this approach.

4C2DD52722CF4EBFB21B75A2EDC8EA1C.description: Explain the term algorithm and describe common methods of defining algorithms, including pseudo-code, flowcharts and structured English.

7A90EAE649A54A4F9A1B78D38A26E652.description: Describe, interpret and manipulate data structures including arrays (up to three dimensions), stacks, queues, trees, linked lists and hash tables.
